alert.note: Alert for Blair; Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT HUNTINGDON...MIFFLIN AND EASTERN BLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers extending from near Tyrone to Martinsburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of over 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Huntingdon, Tyrone, Mount Union, Bald Eagle, Burnham, Martinsburg, Belleville, Warriors Mark, Milroy, Highland Park, Williamsburg, Yeagertown, Strodes Mills, Reedsville, Allensville, Rockhill Furnace, Spruce Creek, Dudley and Birmingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central and central Pennsylvania. A High Wind Warning remains in effect until 2 AM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
